com.intel.device.impl.fightclub.sensor.sensors

Class AbstractPhoneSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intel.device.impl.fightclub.sensor.sensors.AbstractPhoneSensor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PhoneAccelerometerSensor, PhoneBarometerSensor, PhoneGravitySensor, PhoneGyroscopeSensor, PhoneLocationSensor, PhoneMagnetometerSensor, PhoneRotationVectorSensor, PhoneStepCounterSensor

    public abstract class AbstractPhoneSensor
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains shared code for all phone relates sensors. This class includes two supporting pieces of code: a FrequencyGuard class to keep the sampling rate down even if the phone samples faster, and a Measurement Cache to group he data points from very fast sensors into bundles to decrease the number of messages sent to the rest of the code. Both can be controlled separately.

        public void onSessionStatusChanged(SessionStatus sessionStatus)
